name: Siege Engineer

grantsPowers.name: Shield Siege Engine
grantsPowers.description: Channel: Shield Nearby Siege Engines From Damage

grantsPowers.name: Bolster Siege Engine

lore: When you absolutely, positively, have to destroy every wall on the Keep; accept no substitutes.
